attributes.action: Stop the proposed 10,000 new homes being built around Aylesbury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned urge the government to reconsider its proposed growth plan in Aylesbury, Buckinghamshire.  We say "NO" to the Southern and Eastern growth arcs to provide more affordable housing in the UK.  Fill the 800,000 empty homes around the country first before you waste more money and ruin peoples' lives in the area.  The area is a nice market town and cannot cope with such growth and the government are not listening to the people.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the proposed 10,000 new homes being built around Aylesbury."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18426


Prime Minister's Office
